pageProduct.name: White Glo White Accelerator Blue Light Toothbrush
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

White Glo Accelerator Powered Toothbrush has a dentist blue light teeth whitening, while the White Boost Serum provides enhanced whitening effect everyday you brush, giving you up to 6 shades whiter teeth.

Dentist Blue Light Teeth Whitening
- Cleaner, healthier and whiter smile.

Micro-sonic vibration
- Dual bristles for a superior clean.

2 minute timer
- Recommended time for a thorough clean.

Boxed Contents: 1x accelerator powered toothbrush, 1x 20mL white boost serum, 1x AAA battery

Size: 1 pack

Ingredients

Propylene Glycol, Glycerin, 9% Carbamide Peroxide, Carbomer 940, Triethanolamine, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Bromelain, Papain.

Directions

Replace with your regular toothbrush. Brush twice daily as usual. Add 1 drop of White Boost Serum to a toothpaste of your choice. Formulated for daily use.

White Boost Serum
Add 1 drop to any toothpaste each time you brush.

USAGE ADVICE

Dentists recommend replacing your toothbrush every 2-3 months.
